channel.name: EWTN ZA
channel.title: Great Books Every Catholic Should Know
channel.desc: Three more great books wrap up this series. Host Joseph Pearce examines Evelyn Waugh?s ?Brideshead Revisited? and J.R.R. Tolkien?s ?The Hobbit? and ?The Lord of the Rings.?. (30 minutes).

channel.name: EWTN ZA
channel.title: Chaplet Of Adoration And Reparation
channel.desc: A special presentation of the Chaplet of Adoration and Reparation. (30 minutes).

channel.name: EWTN ZA
channel.title: new! Angelus From Castel Gandolfo
channel.desc: Prayed by Pope Leo XIV from Liberty Square in Castel Gandolfo. (30 minutes).

channel.name: EWTN ZA
channel.title: new! Ewtn Bookmark
channel.desc: Host Doug Keck and his guests reveal the lives and works of renowned Catholic authors, unveiling the Christian themes and philosophy that inspired their writing. (30 minutes).

channel.name: EWTN ZA
channel.title: The Spirit Of Catholic Leadership
channel.desc: Fr. Spitzer discusses the second of the Four Responsibilities of Leadership, problem-solving. In this episode we learn how leaders can best make use of their spiritual lives in the area of problem-solving. (30 minutes).

channel.name: EWTN ZA
channel.title: Setting Captives Free: A Deeper Look At Ignatian Discernment Of Spirits
channel.desc: St. Ignatius of Loyola?s concept of discernment of spirits and Blaise Pascal?s ideas on diversion are the topics of this thoughtful examination by Fr. Timothy Gallagher. (30 minutes).

channel.name: EWTN ZA
channel.title: Sunday Mass
channel.desc: The Franciscan Missionaries of the Eternal Word celebrate the Holy Sacrifice of the Mass each Sunday from Our Lady of the Angels Chapel as friars intone Gregorian chant. Visiting clergy concelebrate this sacrament. LIVE Sundays at 8 am Eastern. (80 minutes).

channel.name: EWTN ZA
channel.title: The Litany Of The Sacred Heart Of Jesus
channel.desc: Join the Franciscan Missionaries of the Eternal Word at the Shrine of the Most Blessed Sacrament in Hanceville, Alabama, as they pray the Litany of the Sacred Heart. (10 minutes).

channel.name: EWTN ZA
channel.title: Praying As A Family
channel.desc: In trusting the Lord to be their strength when they are weak, these families reveal how weakness can lead a family to holiness. (30 minutes).

channel.name: EWTN ZA
channel.title: Sunday Best With Fr. Groeschel
channel.desc: Today?s mailbag is overflowing with questions from viewers about the grief of losing one?s spouse, confusion about receiving the Eucharist at Mass, and needing love from family members who are unjustly harsh to you. (30 minutes).

channel.name: EWTN ZA
channel.title: The Gospels
channel.desc: With 56 citations about the Holy Spirit, the Acts of the Apostles focuses on the missionary journeys of Peter and Paul to spread the Gospel from Jerusalem to the ends of the earth. (30 minutes).

channel.name: EWTN ZA
channel.title: Cross Training
channel.desc: Fr. James Mallon introduces his series' central philosophy concerning the unity of mind, body and spirit, motivating viewers to become healthier. (30 minutes).

channel.name: EWTN ZA
channel.title: Return To Our Lady Of Champion
channel.desc: In 1859, Our Lady appeared three times to Adele Brise, a humble Belgian immigrant. Learn more about this Marian apparition and the shrine in Champion Wisconsin marking its place. (60 minutes).

channel.name: EWTN ZA
channel.title: Holy Mass For The Poor
channel.desc: Celebrated by Pope Leo XIV from the Sanctuary of Saint Mary of the Rotunda in Albano Laziale Italy. (90 minutes).

channel.name: EWTN ZA
channel.title: Le Chapelet De La Divine Misericorde
channel.desc: The Chaplet of the Divine Mercy is prayed in French by the parish of Our Lady of the Nativity in La Garde, France. Our Lord taught Sister Faustina in Poland, the five decades to recite. Spoken and sung with portrayals of Jesus' Passion and Resurrection. (15 minutes).

channel.name: EWTN ZA
channel.title: Reflections With Fr. Leo Clifford
channel.desc: Father Leo Clifford explores the various methods of mercy introduced by Jesus to mankind and why they have been given to us. The thesis is that God's love is so great that His mercy abounds if we but seek it sincerely. (15 minutes).

channel.name: EWTN ZA
channel.title: Sunday Mass
channel.desc: The Franciscan Missionaries of the Eternal Word celebrate the Holy Sacrifice of the Mass each Sunday from Our Lady of the Angels Chapel as friars intone Gregorian chant. Visiting clergy concelebrate this sacrament. LIVE Sundays at 8 am Eastern. (80 minutes).

channel.name: EWTN ZA
channel.title: The Litany Of The Sacred Heart Of Jesus
channel.desc: Join the Franciscan Missionaries of the Eternal Word at the Shrine of the Most Blessed Sacrament in Hanceville, Alabama, as they pray the Litany of the Sacred Heart. (10 minutes).

channel.name: EWTN ZA
channel.title: Father Spitzer?s Universe
channel.desc: Fr. Spitzer and Doug Keck answer questions sent in by viewers. They dive into questions asking if science can prove the existence of God, and what is a spiritual communion. (60 minutes).

channel.name: EWTN ZA
channel.title: The Monastic Voice
channel.desc: A look at the Benedictine monks at Pluscarden Abbey. Abandoned after the Reformation but revived in the 1940's, it is the oldest monastery of men in use in the United Kingdom. (30 minutes).

channel.name: EWTN ZA
channel.title: Great Books Every Catholic Should Know
channel.desc: Three more great books wrap up this series. Host Joseph Pearce examines Evelyn Waugh?s ?Brideshead Revisited? and J.R.R. Tolkien?s ?The Hobbit? and ?The Lord of the Rings.?. (30 minutes).

channel.name: EWTN ZA
channel.title: Ewtn Bookmark
channel.desc: Host Doug Keck and his guests reveal the lives and works of renowned Catholic authors, unveiling the Christian themes and philosophy that inspired their writing. (30 minutes).

channel.name: EWTN ZA
channel.title: new! Vaticano
channel.desc: Twenty years after his passing, we reflect on the legacy of Saint John Paul II?A Pope of Prayer, a shepherd of the people, and a man of the mountains. From his deep spiritual life to his love of nature, discover how his witness continues to inspire the Church and the world. (30 minutes).

channel.name: EWTN ZA
channel.title: Church And The Poor
channel.desc: Fr. Hayden Augustine welcomes Dr. James Carney and Dr. Jessica Swanson as they express the joy that they have experienced, serving our neighbor as Christ would serve them. (30 minutes).

channel.name: EWTN ZA
channel.title: An Ewtn Holy Land Experience
channel.desc: Fr. Joseph Mary Wolfe and Fr. Mark Mary Cristina journey through the Holy Land to trace the metamorphosis of Peter from obscure fisherman to Jesus' most influential disciple. (30 minutes).

channel.name: EWTN ZA
channel.title: Mother Angelica Live Classics
channel.desc: Mother Angelica talks about what the Kingdom of Heaven might be like, and why we need to be like Jesus if we want to go there. (60 minutes).

channel.name: EWTN ZA
channel.title: The Crusades
channel.desc: After the miraculous success of the First Crusade, the Crusader hierarchy set up the Crusader States, along with the rise of Saladin and his conquest of Jerusalem. (30 minutes).

channel.title: Sunday Best With Fr. Groeschel
channel.desc: Today?s mailbag is overflowing with questions from viewers about the grief of losing one?s spouse, confusion about receiving the Eucharist at Mass, and needing love from family members who are unjustly harsh to you. (30 minutes).

channel.name: EWTN ZA
channel.title: Ewtn Pro Life Weekly
channel.desc: An alarming investigation finds that organs were taken from patients who were still alive. The life and sacrifice of St. Maximilian Kolbe hits theaters soon. (30 minutes).

channel.desc: Fr. Mark and the Franciscan Friars of the Eternal Word are back. Interviews, spiritual insights from the friars, music videos and much more. (30 minutes).

channel.name: EWTN ZA
channel.title: Icons
channel.desc: Meet real-life hero Sean O?Hare, a social entrepreneur who advocates for kids with special needs. He shares how working in this field helps him bear witness to Christ by building compassion and love for others. (30 minutes).

channel.name: EWTN ZA
channel.title: Knowing Mary Through The Bible
channel.desc: Dr. Edward Sri and a panel of college students explore what Mary?s life was like before the Annunciation. (30 minutes).

channel.title: Ewtn Live
channel.desc: Fr. Mitch welcomes EWTN?s Edwin Lopez to talk about the network?s efforts to share the Gospel and evangelize in Southeast Asia for the last twenty-five years. (60 minutes).

channel.name: EWTN ZA
channel.title: Bob And Penny Lord Present
channel.desc: Bob and Penny Lord explore the life and work of the New World's great missionary priest, St. Junipero Serra. (30 minutes).

channel.name: EWTN ZA
channel.title: The Wild Goose
channel.desc: Fr. Dave Pivonka, TOR, shares how the gifts of the Holy Spirit aid personal sanctification and exist for everyone. (30 minutes).

channel.name: EWTN ZA
channel.title: Marriage: For Better...forever!
channel.desc: Marriage Counsler Greg Popcak examines the eight stages every couple goes through in the course of their married lives together and how to make it to "Happily Ever After?". (30 minutes).

channel.name: EWTN ZA
channel.title: Living Right With Dr. Ray
channel.desc: See how Montana firefighter Luke Stovall balances family and faith with his dangerous job, while Bengals center Ted Karras tells what it?s like being a devout Catholic in the NFL. (60 minutes).

channel.desc: Dr. Scott Hahn and Mike Aquilina explore the canons, councils, and covenants that bind the books of the Bible into a single inspired volume. (30 minutes).

channel.desc: From the chapel of the National Shrine of the Divine Mercy in Stockbridge, Massachusetts. (20 minutes).

channel.name: EWTN ZA
channel.title: Reflections With Fr. Leo Clifford
channel.desc: In Matthew's Gospel, Jesus talks about the Kingdom of God being a banquet prepared by the king with all invited. When it was time to dine, many refused for various reasons. All of this was important to the Jews of that time and also to our generation. (10 minutes).

channel.name: EWTN ZA
channel.title: Crossing The Goal
channel.desc: The guys show how it?s possible to be patient men of God. (30 minutes).

channel.title: Rosary In French
channel.desc: The Joyful Mysteries of the Annunciation, Visitation, Nativity, Presentation and Finding and its graces and virtues. (30 minutes).

channel.name: EWTN ZA
channel.title: Ghana, L?espoir Derriere Les Barreaux
channel.desc: C?est l?histoire puissante d?un pr?tre et d?un la?c engag?s ? rendre justice aux prisonniers qui n?ont pas les moyens de payer un avocat pour se d?fendre. Les membres de l?organisation HOPE non seulement leur rendent visite, mais ils essaient de travailler au sein du syst?me judiciaire du Ghana pour aider quelques-uns des centaines de prisonniers qui sont derri?re les barreaux uniquement parce qu?ils ne peuvent pas se permettre un avocat. Voir le visage du Christ dans ces d?tenus, c?est un acte de mis?ricorde et pas exclusivement une ?uvre de justice sociale. (30 minutes).

channel.name: EWTN ZA
channel.title: Catholic Church Through The Ages
channel.desc: Fr. Connor discusses the selection of the 12 Apostles by Our Lord and informs as to the contributions of the Fathers of the Church, Ss. Clement of Rome, Cyprian of Carthage, and Irenaeus of Lyons. The role of Deacons in the life and ministry of the Church is explored. (30 minutes).

channel.name: EWTN ZA
channel.title: new! Journey Home
channel.desc: JonMarc Grodi and his guests address the personal obstacles, doctrinal objections, and the irresistible attraction to the Church Jesus founded 2,000 years ago. (60 minutes).

channel.desc: Dr. Timothy O'Donnell discusses St. John 3:22-4:42. (30 minutes).

channel.name: EWTN ZA
channel.title: Gospel Of St. Matthew
channel.desc: Dr. Gray talks about the mission of the apostles and Jesus performing His mighty deeds on the Sabbath. (30 minutes).

channel.desc: Fr. Mitch Pacwa leads the Sorrowful Mysteries of the Rosary from the actual holy sites and shrines where they took place, bringing the Gospels to life and offering a deeper understanding of the Rosary meditations. (18 minutes).

channel.name: EWTN ZA
channel.title: The Litany Of The Most Holy Name Of Jesus
channel.desc: From the Shrine of the Most Blessed Sacrament in Hanceville, Alabama, the Franciscan Missionaries of the Eternal Word lead this inspirational prayer invoking the Holy Name of Jesus. (12 minutes).

channel.name: EWTN ZA
channel.title: Grab Your Catechism With Fr. Connor
channel.desc: Fr. Connor concludes his discussion of The Fifth Commandment: ?Thou Shall Not Kill,? by explaining how the Church?s teachings against abortion, euthanasia, and suicide emphasize the true definition of peace. (30 minutes).

channel.name: EWTN ZA
channel.title: Our Lady In Scripture & Tradition
channel.desc: Fr. Apostoli discusses how Mary has been invoked with the title "Help of Christians" since the early Church during times of trial, distress and persecutions. (30 minutes).

channel.name: EWTN ZA
channel.title: Knowing Mary Through The Bible
channel.desc: Dr. Edward Sri and a panel of college students explore the mystery of Mary?s vocation as the Mother of God. (30 minutes).

channel.name: EWTN ZA
channel.title: World Over
channel.desc: Bill Donohue on a controversial abuse settlement being paid out by the Archdiocese of Newark. Robert Royal and Father Gerald Murray discuss the first 100 days of the pontificate of Pope Leo XIV. Fr. Robert McTeigue on 'Synodality'. (60 minutes).

channel.name: EWTN ZA
channel.title: new! Women Of Grace
channel.desc: Dr. Christopher Kaczor and Fr. Scott Borgman debunk controversial myths about the Church, beginning with the popular belief that the Church opposes same-sex marriage out of bigotry. Hosted by Johnnette Williams, part 1 of 5. (30 minutes).

channel.name: EWTN ZA
channel.title: From The Heart, With Mother Angelica
channel.desc: Learn how to follow Jesus more closely every day. Today?s lesson is about how God chooses each of us to serve him, like the 12 apostles, who walked in the faith of Jesus? calling, anointing with oil and healing the sick. (30 minutes).

channel.name: EWTN ZA
channel.title: The Church Universal
channel.desc: Fr. Joseph is joined by members of the Church Music Association of America to discuss how proper use of sacred music deepens the experience of the Mass by adding prayerfulness, beauty, and reverence. (30 minutes).

channel.name: EWTN ZA
channel.title: The Doctors Of The Church
channel.desc: In a bitterly divisive time, St. Francis de Sales brought many souls back to the Catholic Church. This Doctor?s message of God?s abundant love during the Protestant Reformation saved the Church in its time of need. (30 minutes).

channel.name: EWTN ZA
channel.title: They Might Be Saints Montse Grases
channel.desc: ?Miracle Hunter? Michael O?Neil examines the saintly life of Montse Grases. This cheerful 17-year old who faced cancer with extraordinary faith and joy could be the first woman of Opus Dei to be declared a saint. (30 minutes).

channel.name: EWTN ZA
channel.title: Journey Home
channel.desc: JonMarc Grodi and his guests address the personal obstacles, doctrinal objections, and the irresistible attraction to the Church Jesus founded 2,000 years ago. (60 minutes).

channel.name: EWTN ZA
channel.title: Rosary In French
channel.desc: The Agony, Scourging, Crowning with Thorns, Carrying the Cross and Crucifixion help us to accept pain and perseverance to the very end. (30 minutes).

channel.name: EWTN ZA
channel.title: Islande, ? Travers De Desert Glace
channel.desc: C?est l?histoire de trois pr?tres capucins qui consacrent leur vie ? servir la minuscule communaut? catholique de ce pays. Ici, les besoins mat?riels sont abondamment satisfaits et pourtant il y a un besoin profond de nourriture spirituelle. La vocation des Capucins n?est pas de s?adresser ? des foules de gens, mais de servir et d?aimer les rares femmes et hommes de la fronti?re la plus ?loign?e du monde qui ont besoin de la pr?sence de Dieu. (30 minutes).

channel.name: EWTN ZA
channel.title: Speaking Of Saints
channel.desc: Susan Conroy, long-time friend of Mother Teresa of Calcutta, examines how she looked at prayer in our everyday lives. (30 minutes).

channel.title: Ghana, L?espoir Derriere Les Barreaux
channel.desc: C?est l?histoire puissante d?un pr?tre et d?un la?c engag?s ? rendre justice aux prisonniers qui n?ont pas les moyens de payer un avocat pour se d?fendre. Les membres de l?organisation HOPE non seulement leur rendent visite, mais ils essaient de travailler au sein du syst?me judiciaire du Ghana pour aider quelques-uns des centaines de prisonniers qui sont derri?re les barreaux uniquement parce qu?ils ne peuvent pas se permettre un avocat. Voir le visage du Christ dans ces d?tenus, c?est un acte de mis?ricorde et pas exclusivement une ?uvre de justice sociale. (30 minutes).

channel.title: Faith And Life
channel.desc: Fr. Martin O?Hagan, a parish priest in County Down, Ireland, moonlights as a member of the multi-platinum music group ?The Priests.? They once held the world record as the fastest-selling UK debut for a classical act. (30 minutes).

channel.name: EWTN ZA
channel.title: Journey Home
channel.desc: JonMarc Grodi and his guests address the personal obstacles, doctrinal objections, and the irresistible attraction to the Church Jesus founded 2,000 years ago. (60 minutes).

channel.name: EWTN ZA
channel.title: new! Alive In Christ The Martyrs Of The Church
channel.desc: Find the true meaning of courage and human dignity in the stories of Saints Perpetua and Felicity, and the 40 Martyrs of Sebaste, who gave their lives for Christ. (30 minutes).

channel.name: EWTN ZA
channel.title: The "reformation"
channel.desc: Calvin?s controversial impact on the Protestant Reformation, and the divisive role of Calvinist preachers in the Wars of Religion. See how the faithful rallied in opposition and worked fervently to bring many back to Catholicism. (30 minutes).

channel.name: EWTN ZA
channel.title: Explore With The Miracle Hunter
channel.desc: Michael O?Neill investigates a miraculous encounter at the site where St. Paul was martyred. The Virgin of Revelation?s appearance to Bruno Cornacchiola, a rabid anti-Catholic, changed both the man and the Church itself. (30 minutes).

channel.name: EWTN ZA
channel.title: Real Life Catholic
channel.desc: After a flooded engine leaves them stranded, Chris Stefanick and Catholic survivalist Will Hince journey through the wilderness; later, Chris witnesses the hunting power of a full-grown hawk. (30 minutes).

channel.title: new! Ewtn News Nightly
channel.desc: EWTN News Nightly is our daily news and analysis program presenting breaking Catholic News worldwide, top stories, and daily reports from the White House, Capitol Hill, and Rome. Weekdays at 6 & 9 PM EST. (30 minutes).

channel.name: EWTN ZA
channel.title: Saints For Today
channel.desc: Father John Horgan explores the life of Blessed Charles of Mt. Argus and his special gifts of healing. (30 minutes).

channel.name: EWTN ZA
channel.title: Mother Angelica Live Classics
channel.desc: Mother explains Our Lord's choice in Peter. (60 minutes).

channel.name: EWTN ZA
channel.title: God's Blueprint For A Happy Life
channel.desc: What is meant by the term "defective religion"? Deacon Harold and Fr. Mullady explore the misunderstandings behind its use, and discuss topics of perjury, tempting God, sacrilege and simony. (30 minutes).

channel.name: EWTN ZA
channel.title: Biblical Story Of The Mass
channel.desc: Hosts Tom Nash and Fr. Wade Menezes discuss Passover, Yom Kippur and the sacrifice of the Mass. (30 minutes).

channel.name: EWTN ZA
channel.title: Ewtn News Nightly
channel.desc: EWTN News Nightly is our daily news and analysis program presenting breaking Catholic News worldwide, top stories, and daily reports from the White House, Capitol Hill, and Rome. Weekdays at 6 & 9 PM EST. (30 minutes).

channel.name: EWTN ZA
channel.title: Daily Mass
channel.desc: The Franciscan Missionaries of the Eternal Word celebrate Mass from the Our Lady of Angels Chapel in Irondale, AL. (LIVE DAILY at 8 am Eastern). (60 minutes).

channel.name: EWTN ZA
channel.title: The Holy Land Rosary
channel.desc: Fr. Mitch Pacwa leads the Glorious Mysteries of the Rosary from the actual holy sites and shrines where they took place, bringing the Gospels to life and offering a deeper understanding of the Rosary meditations. (18 minutes).

channel.name: EWTN ZA
channel.title: The Litany Of The Divine Child Jesus
channel.desc: Join the Franciscan Missionaries of the Eternal Word as they recite the litany of the Divine Child Jesus from the Shrine of the Most Blessed Sacrament in Hanceville, Alabama. (12 minutes).

channel.name: EWTN ZA
channel.title: new! Scripture And Tradition With Fr. Mitch Pacwa
channel.desc: EWTN Favorite and Scripture Scholar Fr. Mitch Pacwa analyzes Church Traditions and Teachings in light of Sacred Scripture during this weekly live program. (60 minutes).

channel.name: EWTN ZA
channel.title: Knowing Mary Through The Bible
channel.desc: Dr. Edward Sri and a panel of college students look at the Biblical foundation for Mary?s Queenship. (30 minutes).

channel.name: EWTN ZA
channel.title: Journey Home
channel.desc: Fr. Sebastian White, OP, a former Evangelical and Anglican, discusses his conversion to the Catholic Faith. Hosted by Marcus Grodi. (60 minutes).

channel.name: EWTN ZA
channel.title: Women Of Grace
channel.desc: Guests Christopher Kaczor and Fr. Scott Borgman set the record straight on the Church's stance on contraception. Hosted by Johnnette Williams, part 2 of 5. (30 minutes).

channel.name: EWTN ZA
channel.title: Catholics, The Bible & The Early Church
channel.desc: Father Harold Cohen S.J. examines the Early Church?s devotion to the Blessed Virgin Mary. (30 minutes).

channel.name: EWTN ZA
channel.title: Saints Vs. Scoundrels
channel.desc: Part One. Thomas Aquinas and Rene Descartes compare philosophies and match wits over a game of chess. But one member of this historic pair is not being truthful about his intentions, which leads to an impromptu dousing. (30 minutes).

channel.name: EWTN ZA
channel.title: Chesterton Station
channel.desc: While waiting at a mysterious train station, writer and philosopher, G.K. Chesterton reflects upon his life, St. Francis and God?s many blessings, until a strange gift reveals the station hides a greater truth. (30 minutes).

channel.name: EWTN ZA
channel.title: new! Living Divine Mercy
channel.desc: Fr. Chris explains what Scripture and the Church teach about the Anti-Christ. Zachary King, former satanic high wizard, also joins to share his miraculous conversion. (30 minutes).

channel.name: EWTN ZA
channel.title: Get A Life In Christ
channel.desc: Dedicated to Confirmation and the Holy Spirit, this episode is a down-home look at what Confirmation is, how it is conferred and what is receives from this Sacrament. It is filled with no-nonsense information on the application in our lives. (30 minutes).

channel.name: EWTN ZA
channel.title: Chaplet Of Divine Mercy
channel.desc: From the chapel of the National Shrine of the Divine Mercy in Stockbridge, Massachusetts. (20 minutes).

channel.name: EWTN ZA
channel.title: Reflections With Fr. Leo Clifford
channel.desc: Fr. Leo Clifford explains we are no different than the Prodigal Son's older brother if we show indifference to others. (10 minutes).

channel.name: EWTN ZA
channel.title: Vaticano
channel.desc: Twenty years after his passing, we reflect on the legacy of Saint John Paul II?A Pope of Prayer, a shepherd of the people, and a man of the mountains. From his deep spiritual life to his love of nature, discover how his witness continues to inspire the Church and the world. (30 minutes).

channel.name: EWTN ZA
channel.title: Alive In Christ The Martyrs Of The Church
channel.desc: Find the true meaning of courage and human dignity in the stories of Saints Perpetua and Felicity, and the 40 Martyrs of Sebaste, who gave their lives for Christ. (30 minutes).

channel.name: EWTN ZA
channel.title: The Roamin' Catholic
channel.desc: While cleaning out closets, Rob recounts his surfing adventures to Jacek and learns a lesson on humility when his embellished stories lead to understanding the life of Rita Rizzo. (30 minutes).
